question: What are the trends in technology adoption among companies in the healthcare industry?

subtasks.task: Identify all companies operating in the healthcare industry and gather their basic information.
Analyze the technology stack of these companies to determine the technologies they have adopted recently.
Examine the company focus areas to understand the specific IT focus areas they are investing in or pursuing strategies around.
Investigate any partnerships with technology vendors to see which companies are collaborating on IT advancements in the healthcare sector.
Review social media metrics to gauge engagement with technology related content shared by these healthcare companies.
